Articles.Content: A large bucket of sodium hydroxide being dumped into the pit on the floor below....
1309: A notice saying the pool on floor 1307 is closed due to contamination.

1310: Aiden Pearce hacking a variable message sign.

Edited December 6, 2015 by CommanderCoye
1311: A variable message sign hacking Aiden Pearce.
1312: The "No Pointy Food" guy from Goat Simulator is giving a speech on this floor.

1314: You find what appears to be a large hallway with an elevator at the end. Inside the elevator is Scarlet Johansen wondering where 1313 is.

 

Do you
Continue to the next floor: Turn to page 1315
Stay with Scarlet: Put book down and get busy with the fizzy.

Edited December 9, 2015 by Pronoes

2 minutes ago, Pronoes said:

1314: You find what appears to be a large hallway with an elevator at the end. Inside the elevator is Scarlet Johansen wondering where 1313 is.

Plot twist: The elevator is floor 1313!

I go to 1315, where I see a llama in a top hat.

1316: Paul telling Carl not to throw people out of windows.

 

 

 

(Llamas with Hats)

1317: You see Gas Planet 2 with ship orbiting around it made of parts you've never seen before. You wonder if your in v3.7.

Edited December 10, 2015 by TopHeavy11
Not epic enough
Many asteroids orbit the tower at floor 1318. One clips the side of the building.

Skip 19:

1337: Doge lives here. as does John F Kennedy and Teddy Roosevelt. (In other words, Murica.)
1320: Someone trying to work out the math to how 1337 comes after 1318. He has already covered three whiteboards in calculations and has not found a solution.
1321: A KSP live-stream studio crew crashing stock vtols into the vab helipad.
1322: CS:GO streamers freaking out as they didn't get the R8 Revolver Fade.
1323: Masses of people are typing on laptops. You investigate to discover they are adding their part to the 3 Word Story! (Cheeky plug :P)
A car skidding with 1 wheel gone and two men jumping out at the last second

1325: There are no walls on this floor. You wonder how the ceiling is held up, then notice the rocket engines on the outside of the next floor firing at full power. The rest of the building seems to be drifting slowly upwards, so you hurry on to the stairs to minimize the climb.
You find a fuel gauge at 50%. You now know why the building is drifting upwards.
1326: You start to die of asphyxiation.
1327: The rockets run out of fuel. Thankfuly, the entire building did not collapse...
1328: You pass a Jimi Hendrix concert...
1329: You see a blue box out the window with a man yelling "Allons-y!" at the top of his lungs.
1330: This floor is really laggy for some reason. Then you see five hundred reaction wheels and mainsails out the window.
1331: You see a space kraken playing a bango singing the ksp theme, and try to bleach your eyeballs.
1332: 10000 copied people
